title: FS: Ten N172 Old Judge Cleveland players - all graded
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS: Ten N172 Old Judge Cleveland players - all graded
posts.post_content:
I've got the following ten Old Judge Cleveland players for sale:

1) Crowell - SGC 60 - $275
2) Faatz - SGC 30 - $275 (would be a PSA 6MK or PSA 7MK)
3) Hotaling - SGC 30 - $275 (would be a PSA 6MK or PSA 7MK)
4) O'Brien - SGC 30 - $180 (a "real" SGC 30 with 30 corner wear)
5) Sprague - SGC 30 - $275 (another PSA 6MK or PSA 7MK)
6) Sutcliffe - SGC 40 - $250 (a solid vg card)
7) Tebeau - batting - SGC 30 - $325 (another PSA 6 MK or PSA 7MK)
8) Tebeau - throwing - SGC 20 - $295 (great image, small paper loss on back)
9) Twitchell - GAI 3.5 - $295 (super bold image)
10) Zimmer - SGC 50 - $275 

Most of the cards that are graded SGC 30 in this group would come back as PSA 6MK or PSA 7 MK if the cards were cracked and submitted to PSA if PSA still uses the MK designation.  They got hammered by SGC because someone erased writing of a previous owners name from the card backs.  The fronts are unmarked and the corners speak for themselves.  Please email me at [url]Eangyal@roadrunner.com[/url] to ask questions, reserve a card, or for higher resolution scans.  References available upon request.  Thanks for looking,

Eric

Eric:

Very nice Thompson at a good price

posts.post_title: Added some graded Cleveland Old Judges
